This game is really simple to understand, even if you don't speak German (fyi you can also choose French). It's a simple match-3 (or more) puzzle game, mixed in with some spot-the-difference and hidden object minigames between levels. I really enjoyed its simplicity and the whimsical guitar music is sweet too. Thanks Simmyboy.
